<math alttext="1.50 atmospheres" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>atm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the number of moles of <math alttext="N 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> did not change.
